entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @CNN One is the worst country in the world for dealing with coronavirus, one is the worst country in Europe for dealing with coronavirus, and then they claim that someone else wants to get some good idea from them for dealing with the virus. https://t.co/7oy0RZLxbE
